name: Space Asteroids
description:
Space Asteroids

---

Foreword

A fun project building on top of ForeignGuyMike's tutorial of Asteroids game.

We provided source code (in Kotlin via libgdx). 

If you enjoy the game, consider donate when download! Thanks!

---

What is it?

Go back in time in the space full of asteroids, and flying saucers trying to kill you, and rip you apart. You have limited amount of bullets before you can fire them again, so every shot counts!

Be competent enough to control your ship to evade, and avoid obstacles in your way.

Say alive as long as possible to reach highest local scores. Give it to your friend as a challenge asking them to beat your score!

With slick control for mobile, you will feel at home and enjoy the space traveling.

---

  • Include Desktop build
